title: Samsung Black Gear S2 Smartwatch SM-R7200ZKAXAR - Overview
description:
Samsung White Gear S2 Smartwatch - SM-R7200ZWAXAR
http://www.abt.com/product/95019/Samsung-SMR7200ZWAXAR.html

With its stylish design and quick access to apps and notifications the Samsung Gear S2 helps you dial in to every moment.
Features:
• Circular Design
Style meets function with the new Samsung Gear S2.
• Customizable Watch Faces
Express yourself with a selection of customizable watch face designs to make your Gear S2 a device for all occasions.
• Apps for Every Moment
o Get important notifications with just a glance at your wrist.
• Calendar
Keep up to date on your busy schedule.
o Weve partnered with the apps you already know and love.
• Nike+ 
Track your runs and get help reaching your goals.
o Taking charge of your health is easy with Gear S2.
• Activity Tracking
Take a step toward better health with activity tracking.
• Compatible with Most Android™ Smartphones
The first Samsung smartwatch thats compatible with most Android™ smartphones.
• Wireless Charging
With built-in wireless charging its easy to keep the Gear S2 powered up – simply set it on the included wireless charging dock.
